name: Vanillish
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: None

Note: Adds 6 Vanillite in this pattern:
         XOXOXO          X - 1st disruption
         XOXOXO          O - 2nd disruption
         after dropped Pokemon doesn't make
         a 4+ line

Carbink, Mienshao

Lucario, Blaziken,
Heatran, Moltres

Otherwise, train up a bit

name: Jolteon
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: Adds 5 Eevee
Timer: Adds 2 Metal Blocks after 2 turns. 
          Add 5 Eevee after 3 turn. 
          Repeat
recommendedParty:
[Any]

Phanpy, Donphan,
Cubone, Marowak,
Stunfisk

None
clearingStrategy:
This may be a little hard because of
the constant disruptions. A Disruption
Delay may be needed if its proving
too hard. Audino/Kangaskhan/Altaria
may help here with their Mega Effects
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 7 moves left
Easy without items. If you have
M-Garchomp this will be really easy.

name: Ninetales
disruptions:
Board: 3 Rocks, 3 Ninetales alternate on 4th 
           Column
Initial: None
Timer: None

Notes: After clearing the Ninetales, 3 Rocks
           and 3 Vulpix will fall from the 4th
           Column. Then another repeat of
           Ninetales and Vulpix
recommendedParty:
[Any]

Aurorus, Donphan,
Aerodactyl, Carbink

Swampert, Suicune
clearingStrategy:
Keep on matching near the Wooden
Blocks to keep matching Vulpix
and Ninetales.
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 3 moves left
Move+5 will S-Rank this.
 Otherwise, train up a bit

sure not to stock up too much Wooden
Blocks on the field

name: Mega Glalie
disruptions:
Board: None
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 4 Snorunt after a turn. x2
           Adds 2 Column of Barriers after 2
           turns. x5
           Repeat

Added Support: Glaceon
recommendedParty:
[Mawile]/[Lucario]

Klefki, Combusken,
Carbink, Mienshao

Lucario, Blaziken,
Heatran, Moltres
clearingStrategy:
Another hard stage. Constant
disruptions so use a Disruption Delay
to be able to make combo for some 
turns. Hopefully, you have manage
to deplete its life by a big amount.
You can also get some Move+5 to
make sure you'll pass this stage.
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 10 moves left
DD if you can afford with a decent Mega
(Mega Mawile LVL5, M-Luke or M-Gengar)
If you are short in moves, then add up a
Move+5 (if you dont want to train up more)
notes:
We got the 9th Megastone and
we can use it right now :D
